Title: contao/core PHP object injection vulnerability allows for arbitrary code execution
Description: PHP object injection vulnerability was identified in contao/core due to untrusted data being passed to `deserialize()` function.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.11.14, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.2.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.11.14 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.2.5
